item.title: By: Aaron Bertrand
item.dc:creator: Aaron Bertrand
item.content:encoded:
SQL Sentry Fragmentation Manager is not free, but it has several features that the free tools and even some paid ones don’t have. For example, you can easily set which tables get what type of maintenance when, down to the partition level. You can also dictate how many concurrent operations can run, allowing you greater control over your maintenance window(s).

More info:
http://www.sqlsentry.net/fragmentation-manager/sql-server-index-analysis-and-defrag.asp
